description: Search Solana documentation to quickly find concepts, guides, and examples. Inspect on-chain state by fetching balances, accounts, transactions, blocks, and slots. Create and manage wallets, sign messages, and request testnet airdrops to speed up development.

capabilities.name: search_documentation
capabilities.description: Search across the Solana documentation to find relevant information, code examples, API references, and guides. Use this tool when you need to answer questions about Solana, find specific documentation, understand how features work, or locate implementation details. The search returns contextual content with titles and direct links to the documentation pages.

capabilities.name: get_account_info
capabilities.description: Get information about a Solana account by its public key. Returns account balance, owner, data, and executable status.

capabilities.name: get_balance
capabilities.description: Get the SOL balance of a Solana account in both lamports and SOL.

capabilities.name: get_transaction
capabilities.description: Retrieve details of a Solana transaction by its signature.

capabilities.name: get_block
capabilities.description: Retrieve information about a Solana block by slot number.

capabilities.name: get_slot
capabilities.description: Get the current slot that the node is processing.

capabilities.name: create_wallet
capabilities.description: Generate a new Solana wallet with mnemonic phrase (12/24 words). Returns mnemonic, private key (base58), and public key.

capabilities.name: get_wallet_address
capabilities.description: Get the public key of the currently configured wallet.

capabilities.name: sign_message
capabilities.description: Sign an arbitrary message with the wallet's private key.

capabilities.name: request_airdrop
capabilities.description: Request an airdrop of SOL tokens on Devnet or Testnet. Not available on Mainnet.
